title: Twitter reacts to Nate Diaz's alleged UFC 244 withdrawal; Jon Jones offers advice
text:
Gallery Photos: Nate Diaz, Jorge Masvidal at UFC 244 news conference in New York view 19 images

The UFC 244 main event appears to be in serious jeopardy after Nate Diaz revealed an issue in a pre-fight drug test with the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency (USADA) has forced him out of his scheduled bout with Jorge Masvidal.

Shortly after Diaz (20-11 MMA, 15-9 UFC) posted the news that he wouldn’t be fighting Masvidal (34-13 MMA, 11-6 UFC) on Nov. 2 at Madison Square Garden in New York, an outpour of reactions from the MMA community rolled in – many of which came from fellow fighters, including UFC champ Jon Jones.

Check below for the top Twitter reactions to Diaz’s announcement that he’s out of UFC 244.

* * * *

Your all on steroids not me pic.twitter.com/ykrZmRIoPS — Nathan Diaz (@NateDiaz209) October 24, 2019

You not the baddest mofo in the game (i am) but you are one of the cleanest mofo’s @NateDiaz209 I’ll see you nov 2. I know your name is clean. I don’t need @usantidoping to tell me shit! — Jorge Masvidal UFC (@GamebredFighter) October 24, 2019

http://twitter.com/TheNotoriousMMA/status/1187502530026192897

guess when nate diaz said everyone was on steroids he was including himself 😂 — Dillon Danis (@dillondanis) October 24, 2019

http://twitter.com/dillondanis/status/1187503936221175814

Well well well, the plot thickens eh?? — Coach Kavanagh (@John_Kavanagh) October 24, 2019

Holy shit. No BMF title I guess https://t.co/NrLeXmWISI — David Michaud (@bulldawg_170) October 24, 2019

Told him not to smoke that tainted weed https://t.co/bfD2RBycqX — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 24, 2019

USADA : It’s all good false alarm that was nicks failed test not Nate — Belal Muhammad (@bullyb170) October 24, 2019

F🤬🤬ck this guys!

I’m clean right here!

And I fight anyone, anywhere, anytime, any weight, any rules set! Just say my name you already know my answer it’s a Let’s go! #everyoneisonsteroids — GILBERT BURNS DURINHO (@GilbertDurinho) October 24, 2019

😳😩 — Megan Olivi (@MeganOlivi) October 24, 2019

Breaking news: UFC is moving on from USADA — Anthony Rocco Martin (@TonyRoccoMartin) October 24, 2019

http://twitter.com/dillondanis/status/1187503936221175814

Breaking news @NateDiaz209 is on steroids 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 — Eddie Alvarez (@Ealvarezfight) October 24, 2019

This is bullshit. Nate’s been clean his whole career and is being fucked with by the UFC https://t.co/dq3nUTK6Zw — Jake Shields (@jakeshieldsajj) October 24, 2019

This shit is hilarious — Eddie Alvarez (@Ealvarezfight) October 24, 2019

And here is conors chance to slip right back in #BMF — Brian Kelleher (@brianboom135) October 24, 2019

Attention is the bmf in the game. — Platinum Mike Perry (@PlatinumPerry) October 24, 2019

FAKE NEWS. Quit trying to fight journeymen Marty. Let Masvidal fight another .500 fighter or Leon Scott. You got a date with daddy December 14th. And we’re not talking about the one in Federal Penitentiary. https://t.co/wO9ssn3NGY — Colby Covington (@ColbyCovMMA) October 24, 2019

Take your number sit down and be quiet @ColbyCovMMA Dec14th I’ll return the favor and “Crack dat Whip”on you 😉 — KAMARU USMAN (@USMAN84kg) October 25, 2019

And just like that, years of hard work discredited overnight, with one phone call. https://t.co/dyCAivteLU — Jon Bones Jones (@JonnyBones) October 24, 2019

Not many people in the world know what you’re feeling right now, I do. Keep your head up man. I knew I was innocent and was willing to spend hundreds of thousands of dollars and countless hours with scientists and lawyers to prove it. — Jon Bones Jones (@JonnyBones) October 24, 2019
description: An outpour of responses from MMA fighters rolled in after Nate Diaz announced he was out of the UFC 244 main event.
